divs: sighting detailsi was at copper ridge elementary school in n. scottsdale for a men's soccer game. i arrived at ~6:45 and proceeded to the edge of the fields to relieve myself. i looked up and saw a massive cigar shaped object that was glowing gold\orange then within a few seconds the object which appeared stationary the entire time just vanished. i must have been at least 20 miles away from this object which appeared to be several thousand feet above the nw horizon from my vantage point. i only saw the object for a moment but i know it was not any conventional aircraft. when the object "blinked" off and vanished i was instantly amazed at how something so big could just disappear instantly from my site.
trends: There have been 42 other sightings in Scottsdale
There were no other sightings in Scottsdale on or around October 12th 2012
Summary: At ~6:45 pm I happened to look up and see a massive cigar shaped glowing object floating stationary above the horizon ~20 miles away. Within 5-7 seconds the object vanished suddely
